alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 5:18PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 1 AM EST Wednesday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
